name: plugin-generator
description: Claude Codeのプラグイン雛形を自動生成するツール

scripts.test:validate: echo "Validating templates..." && find templates -type f -name "*.template" | wc -l
scripts.test:structure: echo "Checking project structure..." && ls -la .claude-plugin/ commands/ templates/
scripts.validate: npm run test:validate && npm run test:structure
